title: Normalize glass surface opacity to 30% across all panels

requirements.summary: Adjust global glass surface utility classes to 30% opaque / 70% transparent while preserving existing blur, borders, and shadows.
acceptanceCriteria: In `frontend/src/index.css`, `.glass-surface` and `.glass-surface-strong` use a background color alpha of 0.3 (70% transparent) rather than the previous value.
UI panels using these classes (e.g., header/footer, cards already using `glass-surface(-strong)`) visibly match the new transparency level in both light and dark modes.

file_operations.description: Update `.glass-surface` and `.glass-surface-strong` background alpha to 0.3 (from current 0.5) while keeping existing backdrop blur, border widths/colors, and box-shadow values unchanged.

requirements.summary: Make the Weather tab Laundry Drying panel use the global glass surface styling instead of a custom semi-opaque card background.
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/components/LaundryDryingRecommendation.tsx` no longer uses a hard-coded `bg-card/80 backdrop-blur-sm` surface that breaks the global transparency ratio.
The Laundry Drying panel background transparency matches other app windows/panels that use `.glass-surface` / `.glass-surface-strong` (30% opaque / 70% transparent).

file_operations.description: Replace the top-level Laundry panel surface styling (`bg-card/80 backdrop-blur-sm`) with the global `glass-surface` (or `glass-surface-strong`) class so it inherits the 0.3 alpha glass ratio; keep internal layout and content unchanged.

requirements.summary: Ensure all major panels/windows across Weather, Farmer, Driver, Radar, Beach, and empty states consistently use the global glass utilities (or equivalent 0.3 alpha surfaces).
acceptanceCriteria: No prominent panel/window remains at a noticeably different opacity than the updated global ratio when navigating across tabs.
Any exceptions found during review are updated to use `.glass-surface` or `.glass-surface-strong` (or an equivalent 0.3 alpha surface) without changing layout or functionality.

file_operations.description: Update prominent Farmer tab card surfaces currently using `bg-card/80 backdrop-blur-sm` to use `glass-surface` / `glass-surface-strong` instead, preserving grid/layout and all inner content styling.

Update prominent Driver tab card surfaces currently using `bg-card/60 backdrop-blur-sm` to use `glass-surface` / `glass-surface-strong` for consistent 0.3 alpha glass panels, without changing sizing, spacing, or functionality.
Replace the Radar empty-state container surface (`bg-card/60 backdrop-blur-sm`) with `glass-surface` so it matches the global glass opacity ratio.

Update the Radar main container and major surface wrappers currently using `bg-card/60` and `bg-background/80` (with blur) to use `glass-surface` / `glass-surface-strong` (or an equivalent 0.3 alpha surface) so Radar panels match the app-wide glass ratio; keep the map layering/z-index behavior unchanged.

Adjust the overlay status alert surface styling (`bg-background/95 backdrop-blur-sm`) to match the global glass ratio by using `glass-surface` (or an equivalent 0.3 alpha surface), maintaining its absolute positioning and z-index.
